澴字的基本解释

澴
huán
〔澴水〕水名，在中国湖北省。
流水回旋怒涌。

澴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huán］
［《廣韻》户關切，平删，匣。］
(1)水回旋涌起貌。
(2)水名。澴水，也称澴河。源出河南省信阳县南，南流经湖北省应山、孝感等县市，至武汉市入长江。

澴字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　澴； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页653第29
【廣韻】戸關切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】胡關切，?音還。水名。【廣輿記】澴河，在江西德安府孝感縣，唐置澴州。　又漩澴，水濆起貌。一曰波流轉貌。【郭璞·江賦】漩澴滎瀯。　又【集韻】隳緣切，音翾。義同。　又滎絹切，音縣。聚流也。　又翾縣切，音絢。又兪絹切，音蝝。義?同。【集韻】或作㶎。

澴字的起名意思

澴水，在湖北省。

Lingering
Basic explanation of words
Lingering
huán
〔澴水〕The name of the water is in Hubei Province, China.
The water swirled and raged.
Lingering
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huán]
["Guangyun" household concern, flat deletion, box. ]
(1) The appearance of water swirling and surging.
(2) Water name. Yingshui, also known as Yinghe. It originates from Xinyang County, Henan Province in the south, flows through Yingshan, Xiaogan and other counties and cities in Hubei Province in the south, and enters the Yangtze River in Wuhan.
Lingering

[Guang Yun] You care about [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Hu care about,? The sound is still there. Water name. One said the appearance of the waves. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Xuan Luo Yingzhen.　[Jiyun] The edge is cut, and the sound is yin. The same meaning.　Yinxian, Yinxian. Ju Liu also.　You Yixian cut, sound Xuan. The silk is cut again, and the sound is worm. Righteous? Same. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo 㶎.
